alert.note: Alert for Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:21PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wallowa County through 345 PM PDT... At 321 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Joseph, or 12 miles east of Enterprise, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wallowa County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
